Notes

MCA Gloversville pressing variant that has the matrix #s 4772 (Side 1)/5105 (Side 2). Similar to Gloversville pressing with matrix #s 4772/4773: [r=9436270] (Gloversville labels have the left-side text center-justified and no (parenthesis) around the matrix text, with the "©1980" and "70 Universal Plaza" address in the perimeter text.) Contains printed lyric sheet insert. Cat # MCA-5665 appears on the Label. Cat # MCA 5665 appears on the Spine and Rear Sleeve, Bottom-Middle. Runouts are etched with ⧈-G-⧈ and ᴍᴀsᴛᴇʀᴇᴅ ʙʏ ᴄᴀᴘɪᴛᴏʟ stamped.
